slides.title: Parts of Speech
slides.content:
**Noun:** Person, place, thing
**Pronoun:** I, you, he, she, it
**Verb:** Action/state
**Adjective:** Describes noun
**Adverb:** Describes verb

slides.title: Tenses
slides.content:
**Present:** do/does, am/is/are
**Past:** did, was/were
**Future:** will, shall
**Perfect:** has/have/had + past participle
